description:
Spring lawn care — meet our Spring Starter Kit

Revitalize your lawn with our Spring Starter Kit, the complete weed and feed solution for spring lawn care.

The Spring Starter Kit is a comprehensive lawn care solution, featuring Dandelion Doom for targeted weed control, Lawn Kickstart for enhancing growth, and Grass Powerhouse for deep, sustained greening. They work together to rejuvenate and maintain your lawn—ensuring it doesn’t just survive but thrives throughout the spring season.

Embrace spring in your yard with Sunday’s planet-friendly and effective lawn care kits.

sections.kit_benefits:
Lawn-safe weed control with Dandelion Doom effectively controls broadleaf weeds and moss fast without harming grass
Rapid lawn growth with Lawn Kickstart, packed with nitrogen for growth, iron for greening, and potassium for resilience
Deep green lawn with Grass Powerhouse, combining high nitrogen content, seaweed extract, and iron for robust growth and rich color
Made for all grass types for versatility across all regions
Quality ingredients like iron, seaweed, and nitrogen
User-friendly applications with ready-to-use and hose-on options
Coverage up to 5,000 sq. ft., ideal for larger lawn areas
sections.whats_included:
Dandelion Doom Herbicide Concentrate: Spot treatment for broadleaf weeds
Lawn Kickstart Lawn Fertilizer: Rapid growth and deep greening
Grass Powerhouse Lawn Fertilizer: Sustained lawn growth and greening
Kit Equipment: Replacement Lawn Sprayer, Motorized Weed Wand Sprayer, Sunday Reusable Herbicide Pouch
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply early morning or evening, and make sure your lawn is adequately hydrated. Avoid use on drought-affected or heat-stressed lawns.
Start with Dandelion Doom for targeted spot treatment on weeds. Allow the lawn to dry after application. Reapply Dandelion Doom as needed throughout the season.
Apply Lawn Kickstart for immediate growth enhancement. Apply according to the recommended rate for your lawn size.
After 4-6 weeks, apply Grass Powerhouse to maintain a vibrant, healthy lawn. Apply according to the recommended rate for your lawn size.
Save the lawn sprayer for later use.
If you have any leftover product, reapply Lawn Kickstart and Grass Powerhouse every 4-6 weeks until the pouches are emptied.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
Is this kit right for all types of lawns?
Yes! The Spring Starter Kit works with all common residential grasses. Whether you have a cool-season or a warm-season lawn, this kit is designed to provide effective care and nourishment.
When is the best time to apply fertilizer to my lawn?
For optimal results, fertilize your lawn when grass is actively growing. Apply early in the morning or the evening when temperatures are between 50 to 85 degrees F to a well-hydrated lawn.
When is the best time to apply weed control?
For optimal results, tackle spring weeds when they are small, during moderate temperatures, typically 50-85 degrees F.
How often should I use the products?
Use Dandelion Doom as needed for spot treatment of weeds. For optimal lawn health, apply lawn fertilizer every 4-6 weeks during the growing season to maintain continuous growth and lush green color.
How do I use it with other Sunday products?
Use the Spring Starter Kit in combination with grass seed, preventative treatments, and Sunday plans. This will help you feed properly, reduce weeds, and introduce better grasses to your lawn.
How to Apply Sunday Products in Order
Maximize your yard's potential with Sunday lawn care products. Apply in the correct order for the best results, ensuring a lush, thriving lawn and yard.
